name: Defense the Farm
description: Short story of the farmer Bob. As on a sunny day,at his beloved farm began to arrive alive deads. As on this day, he seriously took up the defense of his territory. Defend the farm, destroy the incoming waves of amusing zombies using dexterity, tactics, and three types of weapons (pistol, rifle, automatic rifle).
minimum_requirements: OS: 32-64 bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: DualCore Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512mb Storage: 115 MB available space
